alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 3:24PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Fremont and northeastern Madison Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 323 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Teton, or 7 miles east of Rexburg, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rexburg, Ashton, Marysville, Sugar City, Teton, Parker, Chester, Ashton Reservoir, St Anthony, Newdale, and northern Saint Anthony Sand Dunes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain
